title: Riot KateyKhaos  Miss fortune
body:
Riot KateyKhaos Miss fortune 


HI Riot KateyKhaos, i wanted to know if your team fix arcade Miss fortune sounds , because here skin arcade sounds is mix with the classic and we dont have the blip bloop we have the bloop bloop , im a bit sad because arcade Miss fortune is the best skin

replies.body:
Hey! 

This should be reported under Report a Bug, as it appears to be a defect. :) I'm following up with the team today on the status of the issue.
